description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing a shopping cart in a frontend application, including types for cart items and cart state, and functions for manipulating the cart items.

methods.name: setItems
methods.description: Sets the entire list of cart items.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.

methods.name: subtotal
methods.description: Calculates and returns the subtotal price of all items in the cart.

methods.name: upsertItem
methods.description: Adds a new item or updates an existing item in the cart, incrementing quantity if item already exists.

methods.name: updateQty
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific product in the cart.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a product from the cart by productId.
